Articles.Content:
Have any of you been tracking this game?!?!?!? It's GINORMEOUS!!!!!

Can you imagine it combined with KSP?

http://www.no-mans-sky.com/
The space sims are coming for you, fps games!
Meh, the game is so obscure that I don't care the slightest bit until it comes out.
This game might make my buy a Playstation.

Looks very interesting, though I'm a little scared by its PvP side. I think i would just enjoy rambling around.

Hope there will be gaseous lifeforms. I've always wanted to inhale an intelligent being.

Edited August 27, 2015 by Plume & Akakak
I mention elite dangerous again, because it's already out and you can play it.

This game might make my buy a Playstation.

IIRC No Man's Sky is also getting a PC port.

Elite: Dangerous anyone?

or star citizen? or ALL 3!

I mention elite dangerous again, because it's already out and you can play it.

I want Elite Dangerous so much, it's like Han Solo simulator. But my sucky computer thinks otherwise.

What are your computer specs?

A friend runs it on an 820M and i5 5200U.

What are your computer specs?

A friend runs it on an 820M and i5 5200U.

The computer could run it, just about, but unfortunately it's 32 bit and apparently Elite: Dangerous needs 64 bit. So does DCS, my other favourite game I don't have, which is kind of annoying.
Have you heard of kerbal dcs world? You just use the BDArmory AI and you dogfight. It isn't like a full DCS, but it is nice anyway.

The computer could run it, just about, but unfortunately it's 32 bit and apparently Elite: Dangerous needs 64 bit. So does DCS, my other favourite game I don't have, which is kind of annoying.

Getting a good gaming PC is very cheap nowadays, you just need to build it yourself. Just do some internet searching about up-to date budget gaming PC builds.
